title: Microsoft's 1TB Surface Book will cost you a hefty $3,199
text:
Microsoft's 1TB Surface Book will cost you a hefty $3,199 
Published By: Tuaw.com - Yesterday 
Microsoft talked about the Surface Book having up to a 1TB solid-state drive when it announced the laptop/tablet hybrid, but you couldn't ac...
